           Python Package

Package Name: ryupassgen
Package Version: 1.0.0
Author: Ryuzen06
Email: ziel26314@gmail.com
==========================
   HOW TO USE

Use the ryupassgen.gen(password_length) function to generate your password.

example:
  
   password = ryupassgen.gen(8)
   print(password)

example output: 

   kV&#7kCM
